SEARCH
Package domain.controllers

Class DataManager

java.lang.Object
domain.controllers.DataManager
public class DataManager extends Object
DataManager class Singleton class that manages data operations between the domain and persistence layers

    Modifier and Type

    • getUserAnswers

      public Answer getUserAnswers(int formId, int userId) throws Exception
      Gets the answers of a specific user for a specific form
      Parameters:
      formId - UFID of the Form
      userId - UUID of the Profile who submitted the Answer
      Returns:
      Loaded Answer, or null if not found
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during loading

    • hasAnswer

      public boolean hasAnswer(int formUFID, int responderUUID)
      Checks if there is currently a stored answer for a given form and responder Used to distinguish between modifying an existing answer (after deletion) and answering twice
      Parameters:
      formUFID - Form identifier
      responderUUID - User identifier
      Returns:
      true if an answer entry exists, false otherwise

    • deleteAnswer

      public Boolean deleteAnswer(int formUFID, int responderUUID) throws FormException
      Deletes an answer for a given form and responder This method also updates the profile of the user who submitted the answer and recalculates the k-means clustering for the form.
      Parameters:
      formUFID - the form id
      responderUUID - the responder id
      Returns:
      true if an answer was removed, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IdNotFoundException - if the form or user do not exist
      FormException

    • deleteForm

      public Boolean deleteForm(int UFID)
      Deletes a form by its UFID This method also deletes all answers associated with the form and updates the profiles of users who answered the form.
      Parameters:
      UFID - unique form identifier of the form to be deleted
      Returns:
      Boolean indicating success

    • deleteAnswersOfForm

      public void deleteAnswersOfForm(int UFID)
      Deletes all answers associated with a form This method also updates the profiles of users who answered the form.
      Parameters:
      UFID - unique form identifier of the form whose answers are to be deleted

    • deleteProfile

      public Boolean deleteProfile(int UUID)
      Deletes a profile by its UUID This method also deletes all forms created by the user and all answers provided by the user. It recalculates affinity groups for affected forms after deletions.
      Parameters:
      UUID - unique profile identifier of the user to be deleted
      Returns:
      Boolean indicating success

    • exportForm

      public boolean exportForm(Form form, String filePath)
      Exports a form to a specified file path in JSON format.
      Parameters:
      form - Form to export
      filePath - Destination file path
      Returns:
      true if export was successful, false otherwise

    • exportFormResults

      public void exportFormResults(int formUFID, String filePath)
      Exports the affinity group results of a form to a specified file path. Translates all user IDs to usernames - no IDs visible to user.
      Parameters:
      formUFID - UFID of the Form
      filePath - Path where the results will be saved

    • deleteAllData

      public Boolean deleteAllData()
      Deletes all persistent data (Profiles, Forms, and Answers). Use with caution - this operation cannot be undone.
      Returns:
      true if all data was successfully deleted, false otherwise
